#!/bin/bash
VERSION="" # Find the gdb sources # use a cut to the file names in a '7.0.29.src.tar.gz' format # sort them in reverse to put the newest one first # Cut out the version number from the first three characters between '.'s # and return the first result (ex. 7.0.29)' VERSION=$(find /Developer/NVIDIA/ -name "cuda-gdb*.src.tar.gz" | cut -d '-' -f4 | sort -r | cut -d '.' -f1,2,3 | head -n 1)
if [ "$VERSION" == "" ] then VERSION="Not Installed" fi
echo "<result>$VERSION</result>"
exit 0
